title: 2br 2ba garage, utilities, yard service
posting_body: Adorable 2 BR 2 Bath, 1,200 SF 1st floor duplex, storage unit and 2 car garage.
City of Marysville water/sewer, trash pick up and yard maintenance IS INCLUDED IN RENT.
Tenant pays PUD (power) and PSE (natural gas) directly to utility.
We require 1st months rent and $2350 deposit.
Credit check, background check, rental history and income verification are required.
Small pets can be considered on a per case basis.
The yard is a shared space and IS NOT FENCED.
There is currently a washer and dryer in the  house that tenant is welcome to use or you can install your own, but this is a courtesy, machines will not be replaced or repaired.
All adults must have good rental history, no past due balances, verifiable rental history and references.
Verifiable combined income of 3X lease payment.
All adults will be on lease and have a 720+ credit report and no recent delinquencies and no current past due balances.
Please read the description and let me know if you have any questions  for me
and I'll send you a few questions as well.
I will schedule viewings with qualified tenants after the current tenant vacates this week and we've answered those preliminary questions for each other.
If you believe you meet the credit requirements you are welcome to complete an application on Avail, Zillow, Apartments, Hotpad.
